footer.description: A collection of open‑source tools for Filipino students, scholars, educators, and professionals.
footer.copyright: Brown and Proud. Show your support by sharing this website.
footer.copyright_line2: Show your support by sharing this website.

about.title: About Us
about.pageTitle: About Us - Abakada | Free Tools for Filipino Students & Educators
about.heroSubtitle: Empowering every Filipino with free, accessible productivity tools—from students in remote barangays to educators shaping the next generation.
about.missionText1: Abakada is dedicated to serving all people of the Philippines by providing free access to powerful productivity tools. We believe that quality software should never be a barrier to education or success.
about.missionText2: Our special focus is on supporting underprivileged scholars who deserve the same digital resources as their peers. By curating the best free and open-source tools, we help level the playing field for every Filipino learner.
about.educatorsText1: We provide specialized glossary tools designed to assist teachers in educational instruction. These resources help educators explain complex concepts, create learning materials, and enhance classroom engagement.
about.educatorsText2: From lesson planning to student assessment, our curated collection supports teachers across all subjects and grade levels throughout the Philippines.
about.visionText1: We envision a Philippines where every student—regardless of economic background or geographic location—has access to the same powerful digital tools as their peers worldwide.
about.visionText2: By curating and promoting free, open-source alternatives to expensive software, we're helping bridge the digital divide one tool at a time.
about.valuesSubtitle: The principles that guide everything we do at Abakada.
about.valueAccessibilityText: Free tools for everyone, everywhere in the Philippines.
about.valueQualityText: Only the best open-source tools make it to our collection.
about.valueCommunityText: Built by Filipinos, for Filipinos, with love.
about.valueOpenSourceText: Transparency and collaboration at our core.
about.storyText1: Abakada was born from a simple observation: many Filipino students struggle to access the same digital tools that their peers in wealthier countries take for granted. Expensive software licenses create barriers that shouldn't exist in education.
about.storyText2: We started by compiling a list of free alternatives to popular paid software. What began as a personal resource quickly grew into something bigger—a comprehensive directory designed specifically for the Filipino context, with tools that work offline, on older hardware, and in areas with limited internet connectivity.
about.storyText3: Today, Abakada serves students, educators, and professionals across the Philippines, helping them discover powerful tools that cost nothing but deliver everything.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.pageTitle: Contact Us - Abakada Open Source Productivity Tools
contact.heroSubtitle: We'd love to hear from you. Whether you have a question, suggestion, or want to contribute—reach out anytime.
contact.getInTouchText: Have a question, suggestion, or want to contribute? We're always happy to hear from the community. Reach out to us and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.githubNote: Open issues, submit PRs, or star the project
contact.suggestToolText: Know a great open-source tool we're missing? Let us know and we'll review it for inclusion.
contact.reportIssueText: Found incorrect information or a broken link? Help us keep the directory accurate.
contact.partnershipText: Interested in collaborating or partnering with Abakada? We're open to opportunities.
contact.generalInquiryText: Have a question or just want to say hello? We'd love to hear from you.
